titles.title: Holy Spirit you are welcome here

properties.verseOrder: v1 c v2 c b c

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There's nothing worth more, that will ever come close no thing can compare, You're our living hope Your Presence Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I've tasted and seen of the sweetest of Loves Where my heart becomes free, and my shame is undone In Your Presence Lord

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Holy Spirit You are welcome here Come flood this place and fill the atmosphere Your Glory God is what our hearts long for To be overcome by Your Presence Lord

verse.name: b
verse.lines: Let us become more aware of Your Presence Let us experience the Glory of Your Goodness Let us become more aware of Your Presence Let us experience the Glory of Your Goodness
